column1: debra carol tilley| debra carol tilley age 53 of niota went home to be with the lord
column4: 2015. she was of the baptist faith. survived by her parents: evelyn and billy g. tilley; brother: danny g. tilley. several aunts
column6: nieces and nephews. the family will have celebration of life service
column10: 2:30 pm at beulah chapel church of the nazarene. in lieu of flowers family request donation to st jude childrens cancer research center: 501 st jude place memphis
